actionConfiguration.body:
insert into loan_application (
	first_name, 
	last_name, 
	email, 
	gender, 
	phone, 
	date_of_birth, 
	address, 
	credit_product, 
	amount_requested, 
	term, 
	interest, 
	repayment_period, 
	trn_number,
	monthly_income, 
	credit_score, 
	credit_risk, 
	credit_default, 
	status, 
	image_url
) values ({{inp_firstName.text}}, 
					{{inp_lastName.text}}, 
					{{inp_email.text}}, 
					{{sel_gender.selectedOptionValue}}, 
					{{inp_phone.text}}, 
					{{dat_dob.formattedDate}}, 
					{{inp_address.text}}, 
					{{sel_creditProduct.selectedOptionValue}}, 
					{{cur_amountRequested.value}}, 
					{{sel_loanTerm.selectedOptionValue}}, 
					{{parseInt(inp_interest.text)}}, 
					'monthly', 
					{{inp_trnNo.text}}, 
					{{cur_monthlyIncome.value}}, 
					178, 
					'High', 
					27, 
					'Waiting for Approval', 
					'somerandomimage.png'
					;
